Conversation.name: Conversation
Conversation.description: Represents a conversation between an end user and an agent.

ConversationChannelId.description: The record ID of the channel used to initialize the conversation. This can either be a messaging channel for the Messaging product or a call center for the Service Cloud Voice product. Available in API version 50.0 and later.

ConversationIdentifier.description: A unique identifier generated for the conversation.

EndTime.description: The date and time that a conversation ends.

Name.description: The autogenerated name of the conversation.

StartTime.description: The date and time that a conversation starts.
